topics.body:
"@ToskiHero":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5514d7e86368725515e11000#post_5514d7e86368725515e11000
I think a key difference here is that Judge Dredd was created dark and edgy. Adding darkness and edge to what has previously always been light hearted fun is a kiss of death.
topics.author: 4f41ee04945b701c41002af7

topics.body: Darker and Edgier can work if the original already had a bit of an edge. (Kamen rider did have that, But the first failed for other reasons.)
